name: Mitigation Playbook for PowerShell Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses the incident where a malicious PowerShell script was executed on host-22, escalating privileges and allowing further exploitation.

parallel--d3c211e0-5b8c-449a-954d-8cd2a3.name: Execute Initial Response Actions
parallel--d3c211e0-5b8c-449a-954d-8cd2a3.description: Kill malicious process and block external site simultaneously.

action--d290f1ee-6c54-4b01-90e6-d701748f.name: Kill Malicious Process
action--d290f1ee-6c54-4b01-90e6-d701748f.description: Terminate the malicious process running on the system.

action--a12f5f33-9eb3-4f56-bb9d-bc8fd5af.name: Block External Site
action--a12f5f33-9eb3-4f56-bb9d-bc8fd5af.description: Block external site in firewall to prevent further downloads.

action--f0973a4b-f128-4a57-b6c4-4c8f606e.name: Unset PowerShell Execution Policy
action--f0973a4b-f128-4a57-b6c4-4c8f606e.description: Restrict the PowerShell execution policy to prevent script execution.

if-condition--c2e10b94-4f7f-4ec6-86a9-99.name: Check User Privileges
if-condition--c2e10b94-4f7f-4ec6-86a9-99.description: Check if user privileges need to be revoked.

action--c2e10b94-4f7f-4ec6-86a9-99f53e03.name: Revoke Escalated Privileges
action--c2e10b94-4f7f-4ec6-86a9-99f53e03.description: Remove the user from the administrators group to revoke escalated privileges.

loop-condition--5a83e4f6-65cb-4bc0-ae42-.name: Scan Loop
loop-condition--5a83e4f6-65cb-4bc0-ae42-.description: Repeat scanning until the system is clean.

action--51e04d48-2abc-4b8e-ad2e-e80d7b30.name: Scan for Additional Threats and Remove
action--51e04d48-2abc-4b8e-ad2e-e80d7b30.description: Perform a thorough scan to detect and remove any additional threats.
